name: LeonInc Flight Simulator
description:
This is a flight simulator I made in just one week, with help from random repositories on GitHub and Sebastian lagues amazing procedural terrain tutorials!

Features include procedural terrain, aeroplane flying and a pause menu!

controls:

Throttle: w/s

Pitch/yaw/roll: mouse
